sourcesContent:
Something about me

Hello, my name is Stefan, and I am currently 28 years old. I am currently pursuing a career as a Fullstack Developer and am very excited about the possibilities that this field offers. Prior to this, I completed an IT technician training and became certified as an AWS Cloud Practitioner, which has given me a solid foundation in the technical skills required for this career path.

In my free time, I enjoy practicing Muay Thai. It is a great way for me to stay active and challenge myself physically. Additionally, I am also an active volunteer as a rescue paramedic. Being able to make a difference in people's lives and help them during times of crisis is a truly fulfilling experience.

In terms of my personality, I would describe myself as open-minded, empathetic, social, and helpful. I enjoy meeting new people and learning about their experiences, and I am always willing to lend a hand to those who need it. I am also driven and focused on achieving my goals, both personally and professionally.

While I am proud of all that I have accomplished so far, I know that there is always room for growth and improvement. I am constantly seeking out new opportunities to learn and develop my skills, and I am excited to see where my career and personal growth will take me in the future.
